name: Sandslash
flavorText:
Curls up into a
spiny ball when
threatened. It can roll while
curled up to
attack or escape.

previous.name: Sandshrew
previous.flavorText:
Burrows deep
underground in
arid locations far from water.
It only emerges
to hunt for food.

next.name: Nidoran♀
next.flavorText:
Although small,
its venomous
barbs render this POKéMON dangerous.
The female has
smaller horns.
